{"step_by_step_thinking": "Bcl-2-like protein 1, also known as Bcl-xL, is a member of the Bcl-2 family of proteins. These proteins are known for their role in regulating cell death, either by promoting or inhibiting apoptosis. Bcl-xL is known to inhibit apoptosis, therefore it is not a pro-apoptotic protein.", "answer_choice": "B"}
